cause.description:
Help Mrs. Beyer next year in the year long penny war your efforts go towards a school in the ugada region. See Mrs. Beyer room 105 for more details. Be part of a revolution! and HAVE FUN!
1. These children need our help so the suffering can stop. Education and shelter is what they need money is what gets it to them.
cause.mission: Raise money for schools, food and shelter
cause.name: Mrs. Beyer's Penny War : Invisible children cause
